doc.after: Transport is a key necessity for specialization allowing production and consumption of products to occur at different locations Transport has throughout history been a spur to expansion better transport allows more trade and a greater spread of people Economic growth has always been dependent on increasing the capacity and rationality of transport 27 But the infrastructure and operation of transport has a great impact on the land and is the largest drainer of energy making transport sustainability a major issue
